subject: Running
lead_paragraph: Martin Fagan won the Manchester Road Race, one year after missing the top spot by seconds. Fagan, 25, of Providence, R.I., and Ireland, took the lead in the second mile and held it to finish the race in 21 minutes 41 seconds. It was his first win at the 4.75-mile annual race in Manchester, Conn. Teyba Naser of Bahrain won the women’s race in 25 minutes.
